summary: This mod disables the glowing edges activated when using some spells. Only the body glowing is removed, no other visual effect is changed.
descriptionHtml:
[b][center][color=white][font=impact][size=6]NO MORE GLOWING[/size][/font][/color][font=impact][color=red][size=6][s]-EDGES-[/s][/size][/color][size=6]MOD[/size] [/font][/center][/b]
[center] [i]Video by: BDMods - Skyrim Mod Spotlight.[/i] [/center]
[center][youtube]yhYGqpM-FZw[/youtube][/center]
[b][color=gray][font=impact][size=6]WHAT THIS MOD DOES? [/size][/font][/color][/b]
This mod disables the glowing edges activated by the use of some spells.
[b]Only the body glowing is removed, no other visual effect is changed[/b].

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/34981-1-1366345300.png [/img]

[color=gray] [font=impact] [size=6] [b]WHY? [/b][/size][/font] [/color]
This mod is in the immersion section, which sometimes requires to change how the game works.
In this case made me remove the glowing edge [i]indicator[/i], sometimes useful but mostly annoying.
The [url=http://static-7.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/4130988-1366486869.gif]Keening Dagger[/url] shows why, your char will get blue, green and red on each hit.

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/34981-2-1366354346.png [/img]

[color=gray] [font=impact] [size=6] [b]INSTALLATION / UNINSTALLATION[/b][/size] [/font] [/color]
[color=yellow][b]For the main version:[/b][/color]
Drop the .esp into your [i]Data[/i] folder.
To uninstall, simply delete the [i].esp[/i].
Script free, no clean save needed.
[color=yellow][b]MCM version (not released yet): [/b][/color]
Check the beta readme for details.

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/34981-4-1366565929.jpg [/img]

[color=gray] [font=impact] [size=6] [b]MCM Version [/b][/size] [/font] [/color]
The main version is script free and have limited features.
The MCM version is scripted and bring new features:

- Removes the glowing from enchanted weapons;
- Disables screen darkening when using absorb spell's;
- Exception list - Keep the glowings you want;
- Disable the glowing from mod added spells (SkyRe, Apocalypse Spell Package, etc.).

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/34981-3-1366354347.png [/img]

[color=gray] [font=impact] [size=6] [b]SCREENSHOT MODS[/b][/size] [/font] [/color]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6628][b]Thieves Guild Armor_Denim Style HQ[/b][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25476][b]Evil MasterMind Armor[/b][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21705][b]Ebony Retexture[/b][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31191][b]Mage BackPack[/b][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20781][b]Project ENB[/b][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17802][b]COT 3.1[/b][/url]

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/headers/34981.jpg [/img]
author: Ftreach

files.name: No More Glowing Edges V1_1
files.changelogHtml: Absorb Health Glowing effect is 100% gone now.

files.name: No More Glowing Edges V1_2
files.changelogHtml: Fortify Armor Glowing edge is gone. Keep in mind that the glowing effect it's the only effect on this one. Use version 1.1 if you want the glowing back on this one.

files.name: No More Glowing Edges V1_3
files.changelogHtml: Improved Fortify Armor Glowing Effect and added more spells.

files.name: No More Glowing Edges
files.changelogHtml:
Removed Alchemical Glows plus other glows requests.
McM version released as optional file.
